lead_paragraph: GROSSBARD--Gertrude, (nee Schecter) of Hoboken, NJ, widow of Henry Grossbard, mother of Stan and Rebecca Grossbard, mother-in-law of Dawn Zimmer, grandmother of Jacob and Alex. Services Tuesday, 11am at Riverside Cemetery, 12 Market St., Saddle Brook, NJ. 1/3
